summary: Death and spiritual torment stalk three American students visiting the Carpathian mountain homeland of Vlad Tepes.
cast: Francesco Quinn|Billy Zane|Brad Dourif|Paul Popowich|Kam Heskin|Nicholas Irons|Monica Davidescu|Emil Hostina|Iva Hasperger|Mircea Stoian|Andreea Macelaru|Alin Panc|Alexandra Velniciuc|Zoltan Butuc|Guy Siner|John Rhys-Davies|Anca Androne|Adrian Pintea|Claudiu Bleont|Ioan Ionescu|Catalin Rotaru|Cristian Popa|Diana Vladu|Vasile Albinet|Alex Revan
title: Vlad: La maldición de Drácula
